blankStitch: ^KIBOU HOPE: I'm sorry to hear that, it seems desperation has really driven you to the edge, little one.
^KIBOU HOPE: I know you're in a lot of pain and confusion.
^KIBOU HOPE: But you must know that underneath the despair there is always hope.
^SHUJIN KOU: (I think I know the answer...)
^KIBOU HOPE: This is a gift for you, my child. Keep going up and don't look behind, you will find your way back.
^KOWAI FEAR: I don’t know what’s ahead! I want to stay in a safe place... I’m scared.
^IKARI ANGER: I knew you couldn’t do it, coward. Running away! Such a wuss.
^KIBOU HOPE: Go on up Kid, I believe in you.
